CustomField.formula: TEXT(YEAR( Transport_Completed_Date__c)) + "/" + LPAD(TEXT((IF( CEILING( ( (Transport_Completed_Date__c + ( 6- (MOD( Transport_Completed_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ))))- DATE( YEAR( (Transport_Completed_Date__c + ( 6- (MOD( Transport_Completed_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ))))), 1, 1) + 1) / 7) > 52, 52, CEILING( ( (Transport_Completed_Date__c + ( 6- (MOD( Transport_Completed_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ))))- DATE( YEAR( (Transport_Completed_Date__c + ( 6- (MOD( Transport_Completed_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ))))), 1, 1) + 1) / 7) ))), 2, '0' )
CustomField.label: Calendar Week#
